name: Centre Court
overview: Center Court takes you to the side of Roland-Garros to make you feel the tennis ball. Everyone knows that with zero game graphics! Note that, for once, the 3D view is done from one side of the court and no longer from the bottom, which gives a fairer view of the height of the ball. Despite everything, the bumpy movements of the players quickly remove any desire to practice this noble sport. To tell you, even Sprites' Tie Break is vastly better. Finally, it should be noted that this is the first program from Egypt, which shows that IT has hit all the countries.
